Body:
Description: I am not being able to block PII data over email neither in application nor in webmail.

Kindly help me in this issue on priority basis because this is hampering my business.
Steps to Reproduce Updated: Set CAP to block PII's over email.
What We've Learned Updated: THe customer wants to allow pii internally over email.

Next Steps Updated: Asked the customer for a screenshot of the log generated by the pii.
Will suggest the customer to use email allowlist.

Steps to Reproduce Updated: 1.Set CAP to block PII's over email.
2. Attach a file to the email. (On web and app email both are blocked with the destination outlook.office.com)
What We've Learned Updated: The customer wants to allow pii internally over internal email and block any pii sent externally.

What We've Learned Updated: The customer wants to allow pii internally over internal email and block any pii sent externally.
Email attachment is blocked with destination outlook.office.com

Next Steps Updated: Adding outlook.office.com to the allow list is not an option.
Will confirm with dev regarding email attachment.

What We've Learned Updated: The customer wants to allow pii internally over internal email and block any pii sent externally.
Email attachment is blocked with destination outlook.office.com

- Customer wants to block the Zoho Suite
- I opened a productboard feature request for it
- customer keeps pushing for it to be prioritised
Next Steps Updated: feature request was created, currently following it

What We've Learned Updated: The customer wants to allow pii internally over internal email and block any pii sent externally.
Email attachment is blocked with destination outlook.office.com
